00031 //
00032 #include "portability/apt-win-dll.h"
00033 #include "util/AffxTime.h"
00034 #include "util/MsgHandler.h"
00035 #include "util/Util.h"
00036 //
00037 #include <cstring>
00038 #include <iostream>
00039 #include <string>
00040 
00041 /**
00042  * @brief Log messages with timestamps.
00043  */
00044 class APTLIB_API LogStream : public MsgHandler, public ProgressHandler {
00045 
00046 public:
00047   /** Constructor. */
00048   LogStream(int verbosity=3, std::ostream *out=NULL, bool profile=true);
00049   ~LogStream();
00050   void setStream(std::ostream *out);
00051   void unsetStream(std::ostream *out);
00052   virtual void message(int verbosity, const std::string &log, bool delimiter = true);
00053   virtual void progressBegin(int verbosity, const std::string &msg, int total);
00054   virtual void progressStep(int verbosity);
00055   virtual void progressEnd(int verbosity, const std::string &msg);
00056   void setBaseVerbosity(int verbosity);
00057 
00058 protected:
00059   std::string profileString();
00060 
00061 protected:
00062   int m_Verbosity;                          ///< What level of messages is wanted, larger num == more msgs
00063   std::ostream *m_Out;                      ///< Stream to print messages to
00064   bool m_Profile;                           ///< Should we report profile info
00065   std::vector<time_t> m_ProgressTimeStart;  ///< Start times for progress segments
00066   std::vector<uint64_t>  m_ProgressTotal;   ///< Number of times step is expected to be called
00067 
00068 };
